de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.server.vo
Class ApplicationConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.commons.vo.ValueObject
      de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.server.vo.ApplicationConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ApplicationConfiguration
extends ValueObject

A value object that encapsulate the configuration from the "application configuration file".

This object will be instantiated by the ApplicationConfigurationManager.

Since:
1.0
Version:
$Id: ApplicationConfiguration.java 781 2010-07-05 20:36:06Z andre.koenig $
See Also:
ApplicationConfigurationManager, Serialized Form
